message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $130, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm still not sure I'm willing to go as low as $110, Bob. I can meet you halfway at $125, though!
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about $115?
